description: This Dart source file defines the ApplicationsProvider class, which manages the state and data fetching for job applications within a Flutter application. It interacts with an API client to retrieve application data and notifies listeners of state changes.

classes.name: ApplicationsProvider
classes.description: A state management class for handling job applications data, loading status, and errors, notifying Flutter widgets of changes.

methods.name: fetchApplications
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches job applications from the API, updating internal state and notifying listeners.
